name: GraduatedCompressionStockings
title: Graduated compression stockings
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a device of graduated compression stocking devices used to prevent venous thromboembolism (VTE) in patients.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Device.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a device for graduated compression stockings.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
